lore: When the first God of Darkness was defeated, the shell of his body broke into a million pieces. It seemed like everything was over, but then the fragments of his body moved and came to life.\n\nThe scream of an Impaler Banshee is so strident that it can rupture eardrums if it is heard from very close. Unlike the rest of its species, it only feeds on the flesh of other animals, and has learned how to hunt and use tools by observing humans.
menagerieDialog: (It remains motionless despite your approach, donning an aura of inscrutable mystery.)
(The emotional instability of this creature is truly a sight to behold. If it's not screaming at inanimate objects, it's crying in a corner.)
(Why is this creature always crying? It's almost as if it refuses to ever be happy.)
Let my cries chill the living.
(She's crying, as usual. Perhaps someday you'll find a way to cheer her up.)
name: Impaler Banshee
